# init(cvPixelBuffer:depthData:orientation:options:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Vision ](/documentation/vision)

- [ VNImageRequestHandler ](/documentation/vision/vnimagerequesthandler)

- [ init(cvPixelBuffer:depthData:orientation:options:) ](/documentation/Vision/VNImageRequestHandler/init(cvPixelBuffer:depthData:orientation:options:))

- [ VNImageRequestHandler ](/documentation/vision/vnimagerequesthandler)

-  init(cvPixelBuffer:depthData:orientation:options:) 

Initializer# init(cvPixelBuffer:depthData:orientation:options:)

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+macOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
init(
    cvPixelBuffer pixelBuffer: CVPixelBuffer,
    depthData: AVDepthData,
    orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation,
    options: [VNImageOption : Any] = [:]
)
```

## [See Also](/documentation/Vision/VNImageRequestHandler/init(cvPixelBuffer:depthData:orientation:options:)#see-also)

### [Creating a Request Handler](/documentation/Vision/VNImageRequestHandler/init(cvPixelBuffer:depthData:orientation:options:)#Creating-a-Request-Handler)

Any])`](/documentation/vision/vnimagerequesthandler/init(cmsamplebuffer:orientation:options:))Creates a request handler that performs requests on an image of a specified orientation contained within a
